holidays.title: International Cheetah Day
holidays.description: Ready, set, go — let’s celebrate the planet’s fastest animal on land.

holidays.title: International Day of Banks
holidays.description: We are here to deposit some information on banks and their importance to communities.

holidays.title: National Cookie Day
holidays.description: National Cookie Day on December 4th is the perfect excuse to eat as many cookies as your stomach demands.

holidays.title: National Dice Day
holidays.description: Get your board games out as we celebrate one of the planet’s oldest gaming tools — dice!

holidays.title: National Francis Day
holidays.description: If you wondered why the name Francis is such a hit among popes, find out here.

holidays.title: National Sock Day

holidays.title: Santa’s List Day
holidays.description: Excited? Worried? Which of Santa’s lists do you feature on this year?

holidays.title: Tree Dressing Day
holidays.description: Trees are the ancient friends we’ve always loved! They contribute so much to our planet’s survival.

holidays.title: Tupou I Day (in lieu)

holidays.title: Wear Brown Shoes Day
holidays.description: Treat your feet with a stylish pair of brown shoes as we celebrate this unique day!

holidays.title: World Wildlife Conservation Day
holidays.description: Explore the significance and beauty of the natural world and its inhabitants.
